Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2009 04:16PM dgdarla wrote: I got a double lumen port a cath just 7 days ago but it still hurts like it was the day of the surgery. It also cramps up into a ball when I use my left arm. That's the side it is on; and, I am hoping that the swelling, tenderness, and soreness will go away over time.  How about you? How are you doing? How is your port a cath site? I hope this msg finds you and yours healthy and happy.  Darla
Posts.Title: Port-a Cath pain? TinaLee Kicks
